messages.body: $TSLA wrong again
$TSLA https://www.mercurynews.com/2018/01/30/tesla-will-move-1500-workers-fremont-offices-major-expansion/

links.title: Tesla will move 1,500 workers to Fremont offices, in major expansion
links.description: FREMONT - Tesla will start moving 1,500 employees to new offices in Fremont's Ardenwood district this spring, marking a major expansion for the maker of electric vehicles, the company said Tuesday. Tesla already has about 10,000 employees in Fremont, primarily at the company's electric vehicle manufacturing plant.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla Tests Money Managers' Demand for $546 Million Bond Deal https://finance.yahoo.com/news/tesla-tests-money-managers-demand-180753134.html?.tsrc=rss

links.title: Tesla Tests Money Managers' Demand for $546 Million Bond Deal
links.description: Tesla Inc., stock market darling and junk bond market slouch, has started testing investors' appetite for a different kind of debt as it struggles to meet production goals for its new Model 3 sedan.

links.title: TSLA closes above its opening price after recovering from early selling pressure
links.description: Jan 30, 2018 [1 min read] Highlights: Overview TSLA ended Tuesday at 345.82 losing $3.71 (-1.06%) ahead of tomorrow's FOMC announcement. Trading up to $2.97 lower after the open, Tesla managed to reverse during the session as bulls took control ending the day above its opening price.
